name: Supply & Command
description:
Supply & Command

We have found an opening in the enemy defenses! Quick, get on the tank, and let us liberate the lands of these vile occupiers!

How To Play

Aim with the mouse, LEFT CLICK to fire the weapon.

Use A & D or LEFT & RIGHT keys to move left and right.

Use SPACEBAR to interact with supply drops and the weapons.

Press E when mounting a weapon to enable special ammo when available.

You can climb on the tank by walking to the ladder and pressing SPACEBAR.

You can get off the tank by walking off on either side. The tank will slow down when you are not on it.

The autocannon can be accessed in the middle of the tank and the mortar in the front of the tank.

The mortar can be used to blow up obstacles.

Credits

Programming, Graphics & Game design
